channel.title: Perfect View : Pumpkin Helm (How To)
channel.description:
Well, I discovered this trick myself while exploring the minecraft.jar file.
Here's steps to get a perfect view with the pumpkin helm on:
[b]Step 1[/b] The first thing you need to do is open "minecraft.jar" inside the bin folder of your .minecraft folder in appdata.
Go to start, type in %appdata%, the open .minecraft, then bin. Right click on "minecraft.jar" and press Open with and choose WinRAR Archiver.
[b]Step 2[/b]
After you have opened "minecraft.jar" you will see some folders inside. Go into the "misc" folder.
[b]Step 3[/b]
Finally, right click on the image below (it should be completely invisible) but say Save image as... on FireFox. Save it as "pumpkinblur.png". Then drag the pumpkinblur.png to WinRAR. Replace over the "pumpkinblur.png" currently in there. Close out of WinRAR, restart Minecraft, and PRESTO!
Right click below for pumpkinblur.png: [img]http://i52.tinypic.com/vh8e12.png[/img]
Or go to this link: http://i52.tinypic.com/vh8e12.png

item.title: Perfect View : Pumpkin Helm (How To)
item.dc:creator: @moparisthebest Moparisthebest
item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

Oh, ok. I didn’t really understand what you were saying I guess.

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect View : Pumpkin Helm (How To)
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:3, topic:378065”][quote author=Moparisthebest link=topic=473951.msg3465589#msg3465589 date=1294868572]
You didn’t really need to ‘explore minecraft.jar’:

[quote=http://www.minecraftwiki.net/wiki/Pumpkin]
Harvested pumpkin can be equipped as a helmet without any actual armor value; it is, however, unique due to it limiting the player’s view of the world as seen from inside the pumpkin. The pumpkin helmet can be removed and placed into inventory.
[ig]http://www.minecraftwiki.net/images/9/9c/Pumpkinview.PNG[/img]
[/quote][/quote]He’s showing how to remove that cover, not how to get a pumpkin helmet.[/quote]Yeah. Because it looks cool, but people don’t like that view limiting. This shows how to remove it.

Read full topic

item.title: Perfect View : Pumpkin Helm (How To)
item.dc:creator: @Canownueazy Canownueazy
item.description:
@Canownueazy wrote:

Well, I discovered this trick myself while exploring the minecraft.jar file.

Here’s steps to get a perfect view with the pumpkin helm on:

Step 1
The first thing you need to do is open “minecraft.jar” inside the bin folder of your .minecraft folder in appdata.

Go to start, type in %appdata%, the open .minecraft, then bin. Right click on “minecraft.jar” and press Open with and choose WinRAR Archiver.

Step 2

After you have opened “minecraft.jar” you will see some folders inside. Go into the “misc” folder.

Step 3

Finally, right click on the image below (it should be completely invisible) but say Save image as… on FireFox. Save it as “pumpkinblur.png”. Then drag the pumpkinblur.png to WinRAR. Replace over the “pumpkinblur.png” currently in there. Close out of WinRAR, restart Minecraft, and PRESTO!

Right click below for pumpkinblur.png:

Or go to this link: http://i52.tinypic.com/vh8e12.png
